Title: Ola Aina signs fresh three-year Nottingham Forest deal
Summary: Ola Aina has signed a three-year deal with Nottingham Forest . The Nigerian full-back had one year left on his previous contract but is now tied down until 2028 .

Title: Jaiz Bank grows profit by 86.5 per cent, appoints new directors
Summary: Jaiz Bank Plc grew its profit by 85.5 per cent in 2024, from N48.24 billion to N82.87 billion . In its full-year audited results and accounts ending December 31, 2024, the bank reported an impressive profit after tax .

Title: Know your new tax laws
Summary: On June 26, 2025, President Bola Ahmed Tinubu signed a set of tax reform bills into law that will change how taxes are collected and paid in Nigeria . These reforms are designed to simplify the tax system, improve fairness .

Title: Court jails nine  Chinese nationals over Ponzi-terrorism scheme in Lagos
Summary: The federal High Court sitting in Lagos, yesterday, sentenced nine Chinese nationals to one-year imprisonment for their involvement in a Ponzi-terrorism scheme . The scheme was busted in Victoria Island, Lagos in December 2024 .

Title: Unilever appoints Sodipe  as executive director
Summary: Unilever Nigeria Plc appoints Ibrahim Sodipe as an executive director . The appointment takes effect from 1 July 2025 . The firm said the appointment was made in a notice to the Nigerian Exchange and the investing public .

Title: HURIWA condemns gruesome killing of Freda Arnong by ‘One-Chance’ robbers in Abuja
Summary: Miss Freda Arnong, a Ghanaian-born human rights supporter and resident of Abuja, died after falling victim to a notorious ‘one-chance’ robbery gang operating in the Federal Capital Territory (FCT) The Human Rights Writers Association of Nigeria (HURIWA) strongly condemned the brutal killing .

Title: ISRAEL-IRAN CONFLICT:Oil prices down below $70 per barrel —Experts
Summary: The price hit $77 per barrel last weekend but following the attack on Iran by the United States of America on Sunday it dropped to $71 per barrel . There are indications that crude oil prices would soon rise to more than $90 per barrel following the escalation of the Israeli – Iranian war .

Title: Nigeria’s export drive in danger as Trump plans 10% extra tariff against BRICS
Summary: Nigeria’s ‘struggling’ economy is likely to take a fresh downturn if the U.S. President, Donald Trump, follows through with his threat to impose an extra trade tariff on countries aligning with BRICS .

Title: Sound court rulings vital for investors’ trust — VP Shettima
Summary: The Federal Government has called on the judiciary to play a more proactive role in deepening the country’s capital market by delivering timely, well-reasoned, and technically sound judgments .

Title: 2027: Presidency plotting to destabilise us, ADC wails
Summary: Tinubu administration cannot withstand pressure of a united and credible opposition . It is now obvious that the government has lost the trust of the Nigerian people, says the ADC .
